briefTitle: REducing With MetfOrmin Vascular Adverse Lesions in Type 1 Diabetes (REMOVAL)
officialTitle: Phase 3 Study of Metformin in Adults With Type 1 Diabetes
summary: The trial is conducted in the United Kingdom (UK), Australia, Canada, Denmark and the Netherlands. The aim is to test whether 3 years treatment with metformin added to titrated insulin therapy (towards target HbA1c 7.0%/53 mmol/mol) reduces atherosclerosis, as measured by progression of carotid intima-media thickness (cIMT), in adults with confirmed type 1 diabetes aged 40 years and over at increased risk for cardiovascular disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Averaged Mean Far Wall Common Carotid Artery Intima-media Thickness (cIMT)
